A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Fantastic\, if imperfect\, Star Wars movie. In my opinion the negativity is overblown and hyperbolic. It has warts for sure\, a few scenes are definitely  odd or fall flat\, and IMHO it was longer than it needed to be. Some of the side-plots dragged in the middle of the film.

But overall: it delivered amazing action\, great emotional/character moments and some real surprises. Kylo in particular stands out as a great character terrifically acted here. 

So again: not perfect\, but not even remotely a 0 - 1 star movie.
